Auto-adjusting mandrel

Auto-adjusting mandrel
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Tools
Value: 25
Search
Keyword: 		Trinketry
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A technological marvel from Galeforge, it's hard to imagine the adjusting was done by hand once upon a time.

The Auto-adjusting mandrel item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • At least Trinketry lvl. 37.

Attributes

+13% Work efficiency While doing Trinketry.
+10% Bonus experience While doing Trinketry.
+3% No materials consumed While doing Trinketry.

Uses

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Payment
Mysterious Merchant 10

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Trinketry chest 1 0.833% 3.291% ~1 in 30

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Price
Mysterious Merchant 40
